summary: Adds Dovah\'s Arrow it\'s a very good arrow with 34 dmg (i can make it higher if you want)
descriptionHtml:
Well i just made another mod called Dovah\'s arrow and it adds a arrow that have 34dmg and cost 16 each arrow, you can\'t buy it. you might find some enemies that use it. idk? i think of adding more stuff to like a (Dovah collection). 

you need 
a place to smith
1 ebony ingot (maybe change?)
2 firewood
1 petty soul gem (for a more cool and expensive recipe, i can change if you want)

you get 20 arrows from this.

made by SeaTurtle5 aka uiuiass

ps the skin for the arrow is ancient nord arrow or something like that but i will change that to a custom one later.
pss looking for a skin/model maker maybe we could team together, becouse i don\'t want to learn how to model. i have enough with (skyrim, java, lua, and some others :)
author: SeaTurtle5
